dublin_core.dcvalue: We have developed a remote control system for the scanning electron microscope SEM It is called Web SEM and can be accessed by anyone through the Web browser It is not necessary to install special software to control the SEM Because the operating performance changes with the amount of traffic on the Internet we have connected the Web SEM to a LAN Internet in order to overcome this We have checked the performance of the remote control operation and we were able to perform focus adjustment stage movement etc over the Internet by improving the method of operation and image transfer
A practical method for the remote control of the scanning electron microscope.
